ExampleDefinition.Title: Error Bars
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to add Error Bars to a Line or Scatter Chart
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Error Bars</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to add Error Bars to a Line or Scatter Chart.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">The FastErrorBarsRenderableSeries requires a HlcDataSeries as data source. This includes X,Y,YHigh,YLow for each series entry. In this example the same HlcDataSeries is re-used to render a Line or Scatter chart, as these only take the X,Y values.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">Do you need to change the width of the Error Bars? Try setting DataPointWidth from 0.0 to 1.0. This alters how much space the bar takes up.</Run>
